class AST t where
  • type Root t
  • root :: t -> Root t
  • children :: t -> [t]
  • height :: t -> Int
  • size :: t -> Int
  • metadata :: t -> ASTMetadata
name: AST Root root children height size metadata

display_html:
data ASTMetadata = ASTMetadata {
  • getHeight :: !Int
  • getSize :: !Int
}
name: ASTMetadata ASTMetadata getHeight getSize
